CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: LZ Technology conducts its operations through its operating entities formed in the PRC, primarily Lianzhang Portal and its subsidiaries. The Company is an information technology and advertising company with operations organized primarily into three business verticals, (i) Smart Community, (ii) Out-of-Home Advertising, and (iii) Local Life. Smart Community provides intelligent community building access and safety management systems through access control monitors and vendor-provided SaaS platforms. Out-of-Home Advertising offers clients one-stop multi-channel advertising solutions. Capitalizing on the Company's network of monitors that span approximately 120 cities in China, Out-of-Home Advertising services help merchants display advertisements in a variety of formats across its intelligent access control and safety management system. Residents are thus exposed to these advertisements each time they enter and exit community buildings or open the SaaS software.
